name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: IGEmail Extract Tool - IG Follower Exportor

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A lead generation tool that retrieves email from Instagram followers, following, commenters, likers, hashtags and locations

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
üëã Hello! Looking to enhance your business leads on Instagram? Meet IGEmail, your go-to tool for effortlessly extracting public email addresses from Instagram. With just a few clicks, save your findings directly to Excel (xlsx) files!

‚ú® Key Features of IGEmail:

Profile Data Extraction: Gather emails, biographies, follower counts, following counts, phone numbers, addresses, and more!
Targeted Searches: Extract data from followers and followings of any public Instagram profile.
Location and Hashtag Searches: Easily find profiles based on specific hashtags or locations.
Easy Data Management: Save all extracted data in xlsx format for seamless access.

üîí Your Security Matters! Use IGEmail with confidence. Our tool does not ask for your Instagram password and ensures that your data, including user information, visit history, and social connections, remains private and secure.

‚ö†Ô∏è Usage Reminder: Although IGEmail is designed for safe use, there is a risk of account deactivation or blocking by Instagram. We recommend using the extension responsibly and moderating your extraction frequency.

üí¨ Support Available: Have questions or need assistance? Don‚Äôt hesitate to contact us at extensionkit@gmail.com.

üí∞ Affordable Options: While IGEmail is a paid extension, we offer a free version that allows you to export the first 50 profiles per extraction. Ready to take your Instagram business leads to the next level? Install IGEmail now!
